mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (id, member_id, content_id, delete_yn, created_at) VALUES ( #{id}, #{memberId}, #{contentId}, 0, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.img_path, c.price, c.delete_yn, f.created_at FROM content c INNER JOIN cart f ON c.id = f.content_id WHERE f.member_id = #{memberId} and f.delete_yn = 0 ORDER BY c.id DESC
